channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stock Futures Slip; Investors Await Jobs Report Later This Week
item.description: U.S. stock and bond markets were closed for Labor Day.

item.title: 4,164 BTC Shifted by Enigmatic Whale Leaves Binance Stunned

item.title: Finland stocks higher at close of trade; OMX Helsinki 25 up 0.34%
How to Lose Money on the World's Most Popular Investment Theme
item.description: Pity the investors in the three artificial-intelligence-themed exchange-traded funds that managed to lose money this year.

item.title: Biden says Netanyahu not doing enough to secure hostage deal
Retail Needs Some Therapy as Cautious Consumers Trade Down
item.description: Low-income consumers are cutting back on necessities, while better-off households are looking for bargains.
